block_comment: The block of code is used to control an LED (referred to as LEDG[8]). Depending on the condition ("pause"), it either emits a blinking pattern determined by the count number represented by "blink_cnt[25]" or it remains switched off. In terms of implementation, a ternary operator is used to check the status of "pause". If "pause" is true, the value of "blink_cnt[25]" is assigned to the LEDG[8], otherwise the value '0' turns off the LED.
